long_description: The neutral-cushioned men's Patagonia Tsali 3.0 Trail-Running Shoes are durable and up for mountainous challenges, with air-mesh uppers that are breathable and comfortable. Welded thermoplastic-urethane air mesh upper is breathable and minimizes any seam discomfort; perforated nylon reinforcement for durability and breathability. Synthetic toe bumper provides durability and protection. Dri-Lex(R) moisture-wicking ventilated air mesh collar and tongue lining are treated with Aegis Microbe Shield(R) to help prevent odors. 20% recycled EVA anatomical perforated footbed with Aegis Microbe Shield supports, cushions and molds to the contour of your foot. Gender-specific, lightweight recycled EVA footframe. Reflective webbing and heel for high visibility; dynamic lacing system provides a precise fit. Forefoot shock-absorption plate distributes pressure and maintains forefoot flexibility. Patagonia Tsali 3.0 Trail-Running Shoes have sticky rubber outsoles that provide 360deg wet/dry traction in varying conditions.
short_description: The neutral-cushioned men's Patagonia Tsali 3.0 Trail-Running Shoes are durable and up for mountainous challenges, with air-mesh uppers that are breathable and comfortable.
